Amelia

A Large Model and Dataset for Airport Surface Movement Forecasting

Our Code

Amelia-SWIM

Airport surface movement data collection and pre-preprocessing tools

Amelia-Maps

Airport map data collection and processing tools

Amelia-DataTools

Trajectory and map data analysis and verification tools

Amelia-Scenes

Scene post-processing and characterization tool

Amelia-TF

Trajectory forecasting model

Standalone trajectory prediction tool
